column5: Anybody know of a tackle shop that carries ABU Koster spoons?  I like the looks of them, but so far, can only find them in the UK.  They seem like a pretty good addition to the ice-fishing tackle box, but I'm trying to avoid paying more than the lure itself in shipping costs alone.  Any help is appreciated
No suggestions for a tackle store but try this...  http://cgi.ebay.com/4-ABU-Koster-Spoons-AB...A1%7C240%3A1318
They sell em in the trading post in the soo here...if that helps.

John -- thanks for the Ebay link...I had already looked there, and it's tough to find any decent selection, and the prices are no better than retail.  But I've got the search saved, so I check it every few days. Troutologist -- pm sent
